titleStmt.title: The dignitie of chiualrie set forth in a sermon preached before the Artillery Company of London, Iune xiij. 1626. By William Gouge, B. of Diuinity and preacher of Gods Word, in Black-friers London.
titleStmt.author: Gouge, William, 1578-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] M[iller] for Ralph Mab,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition with imprint: London, printed by George Miller, 1626.
Running title reads: The dignity of chivalry.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
